high_elves.name: High Elf Worlds
high_elves.description: The High Elf Worlds are a group of large constructed fleet habitats. They focus on a mobile and deadly mix of advanced technology and unique fast tactics to achieve victory

dark_elves.name: Dark Elf Raiders
dark_elves.description: The Dark Elf Raiders are a group of elves who have an obsession with raiding settlements for plunder. Their tactics revolve around attacking quickly with highly agile ships and doing damage after which they quickly escape.

alien_swarm.name: Alien Swarm
alien_swarm.description: A swarm of aliens from far-away systems controlled by an ancient hive mind. They feast on other species, absorbing their biomass to turn into more of their kind. They have a combination of deadly creatures and swarms of agile aliens to defeat their foes.

alien_cults.name: Alien Cults
alien_cults.description: The Alien Cults are a loose band of alien worshippers who have been infiltrated by an Alien Swarm. They form on unsuspecting planets and eventually grow strong enough to take control. Alien Cults use a mix of hybrid alien creatures and scavenged weapons along with guerilla tactics.

abyss_daemons.name: Demons of the Abyss
abyss_daemons.description: Demonic entities from another dimension, causing havoc in the name of their infernal masters.

corrupted_marines.name: Corrupted Marines
corrupted_marines.description: The corrupted marines are a band of marines that betrayed the Human Empire and now cooperate with demons and other heretics to pursue their own desires. They have a mix of deadly beasts, dangerous war machines and tough marine infantry.

corrupted_defense_force.name: Traitor Defense Force
corrupted_defense_force.description: The corrupted defense force are a band of deserters and other folks out for their own interests. They have gathered much of what they can from the Imperial Defense Force and now fight with the traitors against those that stay loyal.

undying_machines.name: Undying Machines
undying_machines.description: The Undying Machines are a race of once-people now cursed with unending machine immortality. They rely on waves of reanimating fighters and advanced ancient technology to win their battles.

free_colonies.name: Free Colonies
free_colonies.description: The Free Colonies are an alliance of several alien worlds cooperating together in the name of survival and prosperity. They rely on a mix of advanced battle warsuits and deadly pulse weaponry to defeat their enemies.

ascended_astroraptors.name: Ascended Astro-Raptors
ascended_astroraptors.description: Uplifted millenia ago by an unknown precursor race, the Ascended Astro-Raptors advanced from feral beasts to exploring the stars. They combine advanced technology with deadly close-ranged and claw-filled assaults.

knight_lords.name: Knight Lords
knight_lords.description: The Freeblade Mercenaries are independent guilds which build and maintain unique and gigantic war machines. The Freeblade Mercenaries rely on huge war machines and good old fashioned might to pound their foes.

faith_wardens.name: Faith Wardens
faith_wardens.description: The Faith Wardens are a sect of the Human Empire which have a uniquely faithful and religious background. The Faith Wardens rely on prayer and faith in their holy symbols along with some good old fashioned holy fire to defeat their enemies.

machine_guilds.name: Machine Guilds
machine_guilds.description: The Machine Guilds are a unique group of several different but organized planets which create and maintain all sort sof wild war machines and contraptions. The Machine Guilds rely on technological augmentation and deadly weapons to destroy their enemies.

imperial_defense_force.name: Imperial Defence Force
imperial_defense_force.description: The Imperial Defense Force is the backbone defense force of the many civilian planets of the empire. They are the first to respond to any miliary threats. They rely on hardy battle tanks and good old artillery shells along with waves of human fighters to defend the Empire.

imperial_marines.name: Imperial Marines
imperial_marines.description: The Imperial Marines are the pride of the Human Empire and its elite order-keeping force should they need to be deployed. The Imperial Marines rely on tough infantry and somewhat advanced vehicle technology to outsmart and eliminate their enemies.

throne_guardians.name: Throne Guardians
throne_guardians.description: The Throne Guardians are the defenders of the Human Empire's capital. Only the most elite Imperial Marines are recruited to be Throne Guardians and with that they are the most well-trained. The Throne Guardians rely on the most elite and well-trained infantry along with powerful and ancient war weaponry to defend their home planet.

orc_clans.name: Orc Clans
orc_clans.description: The Orc Clans are a mostly disconnected species of clans who are constantly at war with others and each other. The Orc Clans rely on massive all-out assaults and cobbled-together technology and vehicles to outlast and overwhelm their foes.

imperial_inquisition.name: Imperial Inquisition
imperial_inquisition.description: The Imperial Inquisition is the order dedicated to hunting dangerous demons and other Psychic entities which cannot be trusted in the Human Empire. Their tactics rely on using skilled demon hunting individuals along with advanced assassins to hunt and destroy those who most dangerous.

forge_masters.name: Forge Masters
forge_masters.description: The Forge Masters are a mining race of dwarven ancestry. They roam the endless expanse in large fleets searching for exquisite loot and are not opposed to doing a job or two for anyone with the money to pay. They favor heavy armor and deadly close ranged weaponry.

gca.name: Galactic Corperate Allegiance
gca.description: The Galactic Corperate Allegiance is a brittle union of opportunistic arms dealers, cutthroat trading companies and private armies vying for control over lost sectors and profitable regions. They are equipped with the best tech and weapons money can buy and prefer stealth and crafty tactics.

assault_focus.name: Assault
assault_focus.description: A focus on all-out assaults and aggression.

mechanized_focus.name: Mechanized
mechanized_focus.description: A focus on transports and vehicle combat.

mobility_focus.name: Mobility
mobility_focus.description: A focus on fast and fluid movement.

tactical_focus.name: Tactical
tactical_focus.description: A focus on outsmarting and tricking the enemy.

stealth_focus.name: Stealth
stealth_focus.description: A focus on sneaky and silent tactics.

vigilance_focus.name: Vigilance
vigilance_focus.description: A focus on alertness and reactivity.

power_focus.name: Power
power_focus.description: A focus on casting stronger and more consistent powers.

toughness_focus.name: Toughness
toughness_focus.description: A focus on survival and unrelenting.

shock_focus.name: Shock
shock_focus.description: A focus on striking fear into your enemies.

siege_focus.name: Siege
siege_focus.description: A focus on siege warfare and denying cover.

morale_focus.name: Morale
morale_focus.description: A focus on morale and battle awareness.

skirmish.name: Generalist
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

elite.name: Elite
elite.description: An elite force to deal with specific targets.

rare.name: Rare
rare.description: A specialist force with heavy and support options.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
expert_fighter.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Expert Fighter.
expert_fighter.flavor: This model has fought in many close quarters fights and survived.

quick_reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
quick_reflexes.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Quick Reflexes.
quick_reflexes.flavor: This model has expert awareness and can react quickly.

arcane_awakening.name: Arcane Awakening
arcane_awakening.flavor: The dormant powers within this leader have unfold.

power_surge.name: Power Surge
power_surge.flavor: Using rituals of might before battle has strengthened the connection to the powers of the universe.
power_surge.description: Upgrade one _Power_ model with Power Surge.

disruptive_aura.name: Disruptive Aura
disruptive_aura.flavor: This leader emits a distracting aura of energy, making it difficult to concentrate.
disruptive_aura.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Disruptive Aura.

battle_frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
battle_frenzy.flavor: This leader can incite a potent bloodlust in their allies.
battle_frenzy.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Support_ model with Battle Frenzy.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.flavor: With a volley of pre-emptive fire even the greatest defense can be broken.

reaping_blade.name: The Reaping Blade
reaping_blade.flavor: This blade thirsts for blood and many are all too eager to quench it.
reaping_blade.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Melee weapon with the Reaping Blade.

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.flavor: This leader knows how to use their speed to its greatest advantage.

swiftness.name: Swiftness
swiftness.flavor: This unit has been blessed with great swiftness.
swiftness.description: Upgrade one _Biker_, _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ unit with Swiftness.

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.flavor: This leader knows and teaches how to read tracks and where to move for maximum efficency.

surprise_attack.name: Surprise Attack
surprise_attack.flavor: Once the trap has been sprung the enemy is stuck in a deadly crossfire.
surprise_attack.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Surprise Attack.

poison_mastery.name: Poison Mastery
poison_mastery.flavor: This leader is a master alchemist, creating deadly toxins and poisons to coat their weapons with.
poison_mastery.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model's Melee weapon with Lethal Poison.

headhunter.name: The Headhunter
headhunter.flavor: This legendary weapon has ended many wars before they even started.
headhunter.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Ranged weapon with the Headhunter.

heroism.name: Heroism
heroism.flavor: This unit easily shakes off the horrors of war.

banner_of_legend.name: Banner of Legend
banner_of_legend.flavor: This enchanted banner inspires nearby allies.
banner_of_legend.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with the Banner of Legend.

brilliant_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
brilliant_strategist.flavor: A mastermind of war, able to a
brilliant_strategist.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Brilliant Strategist.

regeneration.name: Heroic Regeneration
regeneration.flavor: Blessed with unnatural regeneration, this leader can endure countless injuries.

bulwark.name: Bulwark
bulwark.flavor: This leader increases the defense of nearby allies.

defensive_mastery.name: Defensive Mastery
defensive_mastery.flavor: This leader shrugs of deadly strikes with well-timed blocks.
defensive_mastery.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Defensive Mastery.

siege_1.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Relentless.

stabilizer.name: Stabilizer
stabilizer.flavor: Stabilizers allow for heavy fire on the move.

fire_1.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Relentless.

brutal_display.name: Brutal Display
brutal_display.flavor: This leader fights with such a frenzy that enemies flee in terror.
brutal_display.description: Upgrade one _Leader_'s Melee weapon with Shocking(3).

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(0). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

flaming_sword.name: Flaming Sword
flaming_sword.description: A friendly unit within 6" gains +1 AP with one Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

searing_bolt.name: Searing Bolt
searing_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(7). On a casting roll of 1 or 2, they take 2 hits instead.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Target enemy model within 24" and all models within 3" of it take 1 hit with AP(0).

fog_bank.name: Fog Bank
fog_bank.description: Place a 3" diameter smoke marker within 12â€œ. Smoke markers block line of sight and models inside or partially obscured by smoke markers gain the benefit of Soft Cover. At the end of the round, roll a D10. On a 5 or less the smoke marker is removed.

crushing_waves.name: Crushing Waves
crushing_waves.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(4).

earthen_armor.name: Earthen Armor
earthen_armor.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gains +1 Save until the end of the turn.

crystal_volley.name: Crystal Volley
crystal_volley.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1).

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

violent_gale.name: Violent Gale
violent_gale.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(0) and is pushed 1" away from this model.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free _Move_ action.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(8).

frost_lance.name: Frost Lance
frost_lance.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

whiteout.name: Whiteout
whiteout.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

murder_of_crows.name: Murder of Crows
murder_of_crows.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(0) and has -1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

entangling_roots.name: Entangling Roots
entangling_roots.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hit with AP(1) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

wild_frenzy.name: Wild Frenzy
wild_frenzy.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may make one additional attack with one Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

silver_bolt.name: Silver Bolt
silver_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(5). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

molten_rain.name: Molten Rain
molten_rain.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 6 automatic hits with AP(2).

rust.name: Rust
rust.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1 Save until end of turn.

cloak_of_shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
cloak_of_shadows.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit.

soul_dagger.name: Soul Dagger
soul_dagger.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(3). This power can target units not within of Line of Sight.

fright.name: Fright
fright.description: Target enemy unit within 12" gains 2 Shock.

blinding_shield.name: Blinding Shield
blinding_shield.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this unit with a melee attack.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(3).

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Courage until the end of the turn.

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(3). If any model is slain restore 1 wound to this model.

spectral_grasp.name: Spectral Grasp
spectral_grasp.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 3 hits with AP(0) and is moved 1" towards this model.

doom.name: Doom
doom.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1 Courage until the end of the turn.

unnerving_accuracy.name: Unnerving Accuracy
unnerving_accuracy.description: Target friendly unit within 18" may make one additional attack with any Ranged weapon until the end of the turn.

incinerating_beam.name: Incinerating Beam
incinerating_beam.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hits with AP(8).

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Roll a d10 for each enemy unit within 6". On a roll of 5 or lower the unit hit takes 2 hits with AP(4).

rejuvenation_beam.name: Rejuvenation Beam
rejuvenation_beam.description: Target friendly _Infantry_ unit within 12" rolls 1D10 for each missing model in the unit. On a 3 or less that model is restored. This power may only be cast once per turn.

detect_weakness.name: Detect Weakness
detect_weakness.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one succesful die on its next Save test. This power may be cast unlimited times.

heightened_senses.name: Heightened Senses
heightened_senses.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Initiative until the of the turn.

assault_ram_grenade.name: Assault Ram with Underslung Grenade Launcher

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.flavor: It seems luck has gone our way. Or maybe it's something more...
lucky.description: Use when taking a skill test. You may re-roll that test and it may not be re-rolled again. This may be used once per round.

incredible_courage.name: Incredible Courage
incredible_courage.flavor: Even in the darkest of times, moments of great courage can occur.
incredible_courage.description: Use when a unit takes a Courage test. That unit gains +2 Courage for that test. This may be used once per round.

battlefield_reserves.name: Outflanking Reserves
battlefield_reserves.flavor: Sometimes assets are most useful finding an alternate route around the enemy.
battlefield_reserves.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Outflanking Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.

firing_ports.name: Firing Ports
firing_ports.description: Use when activating an _Infantry_ unit embarked in a Transport. That unit may make a single _Shoot_ action.
firing_ports.flavor: Mechanized forces usually have modified firing ports to allow infantry to fire their weapons while embarked.

rapid_disembark.name: Rapid Disembark
rapid_disembark.description: Use when activating a transport _Vehicle_ unit. At any time during this unit's activation, all embarked units may make a free _Move_ action to disembark. This may be used even after the transport has taken 2 _Move_ actions.
rapid_disembark.flavor: Rapidly disembarking is a difficult feat only for those expertly trained.

well_built.name: Well-Built
well_built.flavor: Expertly built and well-maintained, this vehicle is prepared for battle.
well_built.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. For that attack, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 3 or less the hit is ignored.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
toughness.flavor: These fighters are particularly tough and can take a hit.

durability.name: Durability
durability.description: Use before activating a unit with a Damage Chart. That unit is treated as having no critical damage tokens for this activation.
durability.flavor: Some of the most well-maintained vehicles and machinery can operate under great stress.

might.name: Machine Might
might.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit attacks in melee. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
might.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

bolster.name: Bolster
bolster.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by an enemy. If it did not move this round, that unit may increase its cover level by 1 (none to soft, soft to hard).
bolster.flavor: A strong defensive position ensures greater survival, even against the toughest of weapons.

devastation.name: Devastation
devastation.description: Use before shooting with a unit. The target reduces its cover level by 1 (hard to soft, soft to none).
devastation.flavor: Finding and exploiting a vulnerable piece of cover can lead to devastating results.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.description: Use before an _Infantry_ unit performs a _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
rapid_fire.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

psychic_aim.name: Psychic Aim
psychic_aim.description: Use when shooting with an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit. That unit may target units out of line of sight.
psychic_aim.flavor: Visions can be used to guide one's aim.

channeling.name: Channeling
channeling.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a power. The power charge value is increased by 1 and the power has +6" of range.
channeling.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult powers can be manifested.

dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.description: Use when a Power(x) test is taken within 24" of an Infantry unit. Roll a D10. If the value is less than or equal to the test to cast the power, it is prevented.
dispel.flavor: With vigilant training, one can protect themselves from malign powers.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
ambush.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these fighters are trained to react to any situation.

conceal.name: Concealment
conceal.flavor: Imperial marines are sometimes trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.
conceal.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

stealth_move.name: Stealth Move
stealth_move.flavor: Moving quietly is sometimes key in advancing on the enemy.
stealth_move.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit performs a _Move_ action. Enemy units may not perform reactions to that _Move_ action.

moving_fire.name: Moving Fire
moving_fire.flavor: These fighters are trained to shoot while moving to maintain pressure on their enemies.
moving_fire.description: Use after an _Infantry_ unit makes a _Move_ action. That unit may make a free _Shoot_ action with -1 Accuracy. Any weapons with _Assault_ may ignore the -1 Accuracy penalty.

fury.name: Fury
fury.flavor: These marines are furious in resolve and can rip through their enemies.
fury.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit makes a _Fight_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

assault.name: Assault
assault.flavor: With a furious charge, these marines move into combat quickly.
assault.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for the _Charge_ action.

tactical_retreat.name: Tactical Retreat
tactical_retreat.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit attempts to fall back from melee. That unit automatically passes the Initiative check required to fall back.
tactical_retreat.flavor: A quick tactical retreat and a burst of fire can cause an enemy a lot of problems.

encircle.name: Encircle
encircle.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Encirclement reserves before the game begins. At the beginning of any round after the first, that unit may be set up within 6" of any table edge and more than 12" from any enemy units. If both players have reserves arriving on the same turn, roll off to see who places theirs first.
encircle.flavor: With speed and ferocity, these marines can outflank their enemies.

re_organize.name: Re-organize
re_organize.description: Use at any point during an _Infantry_ unit's activation. That unit may split into two separate units or merge with another unit of the same data-sheet. This may not exceed the maximum unit size or go below the unit's minimum size.
re_organize.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

vigilance.name: Vigilance
vigilance.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
vigilance.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these troops are trained to react to any situation.

cautious.name: Cautious
cautious.description: Use after an _Infantry_ unit performs a _Move_ action. That unit may perform a free Hold action.
cautious.flavor: Cautious movement can be key to staying alive.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.flavor: By overcharging their weapons, some hits can pierce even heavily armored targets.
overcharge.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit makes a _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

quick_aim.name: Quick Aim
quick_aim.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit with any _Assault_ weapons is firing. That unit does not suffer -1 to hit when using the _Assault_ rule.
quick_aim.flavor: These fighters are so used to firing from the hip while speeding their way upfield that their accuracy doesn't suffer.

run_them_down.name: Run Them Down
run_them_down.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ makes a _Charge_ action. The Impact Rule gains +1 AP for the charge.
run_them_down.flavor: Those clans with a focus on speed enjoy putting a little extra oomph on their vehicles, making them hit just a little harder when they ram into something.

push_it.name: Push It
push_it.description: Use when a unit makes a _Move_ action. It gains +3" move for that action
push_it.flavor: These orcs have either a special fuel or know little tricks to get them upfield just that little bit faster than their slower brethren.

terror.name: Terror
terror.description: Use when a unit within 6" takes a Courage test. That unit suffers -1 Courage until the end of its activation.
terror.flavor: These guardians invoke a sense of fear in their enemies which has not been seen before.

frozen_in_fear.name: Frozen in Fear
frozen_in_fear.flavor: Letting out a terrible cry can sometimes leave enemies unable to react to what is happening.
frozen_in_fear.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit performs a _Move_ action. Enemy units may not perform reactions to that _Move_ action.

shock_tactics.name: Shock Tactics
shock_tactics.description: Use when fighting with an _Infantry_ unit. If the attack hits, assign 2 additional Shock.
shock_tactics.flavor: With a sudden strike these fighters bring fear to their targets keeping them from retaliating.

weak_point.name: Weak Point
weak_point.description: Use before a unit performs a _Shoot_ action. The target reduces its cover level by 1 (hard to soft, soft to none).
weak_point.flavor: Aiming for the enemy's weak point can sometimes ignore cover all together.

burst_fire.name: Overwhelming Firepower
burst_fire.description: Use before an _Infantry_ unit performs a _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
burst_fire.flavor: Burst fire can be relatively effective in taking down most targets.

crack_shot.name: Crack Shot
crack_shot.description: Use before shooting with a unit. Add 3" to the short and long ranges of all weapons for that unit.
crack_shot.flavor: In rare occasions, weapons can be used past their effective ranges.

rallying_move.name: Rallying Move
rallying_move.description: Use before a unit takes a _Move_ action. That unit may perform a free Rally action.
rallying_move.flavor: Regroup and recovering before moving out can help organize for a push.

never_surrender.name: Never Surrender
never_surrender.description: Use when a unit would break from morale or be destroyed due to a morale test. That unit does not break and is not destroyed.
never_surrender.flavor: True toughness is standing and facing utter defeat with courage.

bravery.name: Bravery
bravery.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage.
bravery.flavor: These fighters are particularly brave in the face of many horrors.

psychic_crystal.name: Psychic Amplification Crystal
psychic_crystal.description: A crystaline structure that amplifies psychic powers.

victory_symbol.name: Symbol of Victory
victory_symbol.description: Whether it's a hero's statue, a grand banner, or a Holo-Display of home, every sentient race has something to fight for.

hidden_deployment.name: Hidden Deployment
hidden_deployment.flavor: Staying hidden and waiting for the right moment to strike can have a devastating effect.
hidden_deployment.description: Any number of _Infantry_, _Artillery_ or _Fortification_ units, one point per pair may be placed in hidden deployment instead of deployed on the field. See the section for hidden units in the core rules for details on how hidden units work.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hooks
grappling_hook.description: This model may ignore vertical movement distances when moving.

limited.name: Limited
limited.description: Only x of this model may be taken in a single roster.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Hits must be assigned to this model or another model in this unit with Guardian before other models.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: This model causes X Melee hits with no AP when it successfully charges an enemy unit.

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction.

exposed.name: Exposed
exposed.description: This model may receive shock even from weapons that it can't be damaged by.

assault.name: Assault
assault.description: Models with this weapon may make a free shoot action after moving at -1 Accuracy. They may not shoot again this round.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.description: When shooting with this weapon, a model may choose to fire twice with it. If it does, halve both the Short and Long ranges of the weapon.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Multiply hits from this weapon by X. A unit may not take more hits than the number of models in the unit.
blast.notes: Small RNG discount to account for single shot randomness

emp.name: EMP
emp.description: This weapon gains +2 AP against units with a Damage Chart.

flame.name: Spray
flame.description: Hits from this weapon ignore any cover bonuses.

breaching.name: Breaching
breaching.description: Hits from this weapon ignore any cover bonuses.

ammo.name: Ammo
ammo.description: This weapon may only be fired X times per game.
ammo.pointNotes: Always apply this rule last or your numbers will be off.

scoped.name: Scoped
scoped.description: This weapon ignores the Long Range penalty.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: This model may ignore terrain and other models without the Fly special rule when moving.

deployable.name: Deployable
deployable.description: As an action, this model can be set up on the field. It may not be used to control or contest objectives and may not be targeted by abilities.

ensnare.name: Ensnare
ensnare.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -1 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each weapon with this rule.

slowing.name: Slowing
slowing.description: Enemy units hit by this weapon suffer -X" of Movement until the end of the round.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: This unit may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ before the game begins.

ambush_large.name: Ambush
ambush_large.description: This unit may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ before the game begins.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: When this unit is deployed or arrives from Reserves, it may make a free Move action. This action may not move within 12" of any enemy units.

outflank.name: Outflank
outflank.description: This unit may be placed in _Outflanking Reserves_ before the game begins.

bomb.name: Bomb
bomb.description: This weapon may be used at any time during a unit's movement. It must still use a Shoot action to fire.

resistant.name: Resistant
resistant.description: This model may ignore up to X points of AP. This may not ignore AP from abilities which increase a weapon's base AP.

resilient.name: Defiant
resilient.description: Roll a die when this model is killed or loses a Wound. On a value of X or less that loss is prevented.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Roll a die when this model is killed or loses a Wound. On a value of X or less that loss is prevented.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: This weapon may engage and fight models up to X" away. Enemy models count as engaged and must still move into base contact to fight unless they also have reach.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: This model may re-roll X Save tests per round.

wounds.name: Wounds
wounds.description: This model has X lives that it may lose before it is killed. If a unit contains multiple models with Wounds, damage must be assigned to an already damaged model before being assigned to any other model.

medic.name: Medic(Infantry)
medic.description: Whenever a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

medic_x.name: Medic
medic_x.description: Whenever a friendly unit  with _X_ type within 6" loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

medic_squad.name: Medic
medic_squad.description: Whenever this unit loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 2 or less, that loss is prevented.

non_combat.name: Non-combatant
non_combat.description: This model may never control or contest objectives, and may not score secondary objectives.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: This model is treated as having X models per base (for the purposes of abilities that interact with models) that it may lose before it is killed. If a unit contains multiple models with Swarm, damage must be assigned to an already damaged model before being assigned to any other model.

crew.name: Crew
crew.description: This weapon requires X models to operate effectively. When the amount of crew is reduced to half or less, this weapon suffers -1 to hit.

evasive.name: Evasive
evasive.description: Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model while it is in cover or at a range of more than 12".

stealth.name: Evasive
stealth.description: Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model while it is in cover or at a range of more than 12".

dodge.name: Swift
dodge.description: Models suffer -1 Strength when fighting this model.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Models suffer -1 Strength when fighting this model.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Enemies without the _Vehicle_ keyword hit by this weapon reduce their Save value by 1 (after AP). This may not bring a unit below Save 5.

deadly_poison.name: Deadly Poison
deadly_poison.description: Enemies without the _Vehicle_ keyword hit by this weapon reduce their Save value by 2 (after AP). This may not bring a unit below Save 5.

deadly.name: Deadly
deadly.description: Each unsaved hit with this weapon inflicts _X_ additional _Wounds_ to the target.

armored_front.name: Heavy Armor(Front)
armored_front.description: This model gets +1 Save when hit in its front arc.

vulnerable_side_rear.name: Vulnerable(Side, Rear)
vulnerable_side_rear.description: This model gets -1 Save when hit in its Side arc or -2 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

vulnerable_rear.name: Vulnerable(Rear)
vulnerable_rear.description: This model gets -1 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

furious.name: Furious
furious.description: When this model charges, Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.description: When this model shoots, Accuracy rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.

crack_shot.name: Crack Shot
crack_shot.description: Hits rolls of 1 or 2 from shooting attacks made by this model ignore the benefit of cover.

stubborn.name: Stubborn
stubborn.description: This model adds 1 to Courage tests when removing Shock.

reluctant.name: Reluctant
reluctant.description: This model subtracts 1 from Courage tests when removing Shock.

power.name: Power
power.description: This unit may use X _Powers_ and attempt to stop X _Powers_ per round.

conclave.name: Conclave
conclave.description:
This unit may use _Powers_ and attempt to stop _Powers_ each round based on the total number of model with this ability: 
 * 1-3 Models: 1 Power 
 * 4+ Models: 2 Powers 
 * 7+ Models: 3 Powers

shocking.name: Shocking
shocking.description: A unit hit by this weapon gains X additional Shock.

distracting.name: Distracting
distracting.description: Enemy units engaged with this unit suffer -1 Strength.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Up to X times per round, this model may attempt to dispel a Power cast within 24". Roll a D10 and if the value is equal to or lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the power is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power.

defensive.name: Defensive
defensive.description: This model increases its Save by X.

hover.name: Hover
hover.description: This model may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: This model may ignore low obstacles of 1" or less in height when moving.

walker.name: Walker
walker.description: This model may ignore low obstacles of 2" or less in height when moving.

repair.name: Repair
repair.description: At any point during this model's activation, if within 3" of a _Vehicle_ unit, roll one die. On an X or less the vehicle may remove one critical damage.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.description: At any point during this model's activation, if within 3" of a _Vehicle_ unit, roll one die. On a 5 or less the vehicle may remove one critical damage.

titanic.name: Titanic
titanic.description: This unit subtracts 2 from all Damage Chart rolls.

damage_chart.name: Damage Chart
damage_chart.description:
This unit does not benefit from Cover. Instead, subtract the cover Save bonuses from Damage Chart rolls. When this model would be killed, roll a D10 adding the amount it failed the save by plus the number of critical damage tokens it has and refer to the following: 
 * Shaken(3+): Take one additional shock. 
 * Panic(6+): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(9+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Critical(12+): The unit is destroyed and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the chart with a critical damage token. While a unit has one or more damage tokens, it may not remove that amount of Shock. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Chart, hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

catches_fire.name: Catches Fire
catches_fire.description: Add 2 to all Damage Chart rolls for this unit.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: This unit requires an extra shock to take break tests.

resist.name: Protect
resist.description: This unit gets +X to its Resist rolls.

open_topped.name: Open-Topped
open_topped.description: Units inside this transport may take a single fire action when activated. Up to X models total may fire their weapons.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Once per activation, this model may ignore models and any terrain when making a Move action.

transport.name: Transport
transport.description: This model may carry X _Infantry_ models inside of it. Units may spend a Move action to embark or disembark from this model. To disembark, measure a Move action originating from this model's edge. To embark, the unit must all get within 1" of this model. If this model is destroyed while units are embarked, each model inside must take a single Save with no AP and then the unit takes 3 Shock. If this unit makes two Move actions, units may not embark or disembark from this unit.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: After firing, a unit must spend 1 action to reload this weapon before it can be fired again.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon may ignore the Long Range penalty and any Cover bonuses. You may choose which model is hit even if it has Leader.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: You may choose which model is hit even if it has Leader and these hits may not be reassigned to other friendly units.

aircraft.name: Aircraft
aircraft.description: Enemy units suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model. This model may ignore terrain and other models when moving. This model may only turn up to 90 degrees. When activated, it must first take a free move its full movement distance in a straight line. If it ends its move off the table, place it back on any table edge. Its activation then ends. Enemy models may not engage this unit in Melee unless they have the Fly rule. This model may not control objectives.

leeching.name: Leeching
leeching.description: Roll a D10 each time an enemy model fails a Save from this weapon. On a 1 or 2 this model regains one Wound.

team.name: Team
team.description: This weapon requires X models to operate effectively. It suffers -1 Accuracy for each model under this number.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

shielding.name: Shielding
shielding.description: Whenever this model is hit by an attack, roll a D10. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

gun_shield.name: Gun Shield
gun_shield.description: This model gains +1 to its Save when hit in its front arc.

smoke.name: Smoke
smoke.description: Choose a location on the battlefield within range of this weapon and if a hit is successful, place a 3" diameter smoke marker at the target location. If the weapon fires multiple shots and more than one lands on target, place any additional smoke markers in contact with the edge of the first hit. Smoke markers block line of sight and models inside or partially obscured by smoke markers gain the benefit of Normal Cover. At the end of the round, roll a D10 for each smoke marker. On a 5 or less the smoke marker is removed.

side_skirts.name: Side Skirts
side_skirts.description: This model gains +1 to its Save when hit in its side arcs from weapons with AP 4 or less.

fanatical.name: Fanatical
fanatical.description: This unit is treated as having +2 Courage for all break tests and does not gain shock from close combat.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description: If this weapon hits its target, that unit gets -1 Strength and -1 Accuracy for its next attack.

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.description: This model may treat impassable water terrain as difficult terrain.

scatter.name: Scatter
scatter.description: When choosing a target for this weapon, choose a specific model in the unit. If this weapon misses, use D10 scattering to determine the landing point of the shot relative to that model. If it lands within 1" of a different unit, that unit is hit instead.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description: This weapon gets +2 AP against targets with Save 10 or higher.

salvo.name: Salvo
salvo.description: This weapon always hits at -1 Accuracy. When scattering results from this weapon, it hits the closest unit within 3" instead of just 1".

overcharge.name: Overheat
overcharge.description: Hit rolls of 9+ cause the firing unit to take 2 Shock.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: Hit rolls of 9+ cause the firing unit to take 2 Shock.

pistol.name: Pistol
pistol.description: This weapon may be used instead of a model's other weapons even while engaged in close combat.

strider.name: Strider
strider.description: This model can cross difficult and dangerous terrain without penalty.

rending.name: Rending
rending.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

indirect.name: Indirect
indirect.description: This weapon may target units out of line of sight at -1 Accuracy.

anti_air.name: Anti-air
anti_air.description: This weapon gets +1 to hit units with the Aircraft special rule.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: One model in this unit may use this weapon instead of any other weapons. This weapon ignores cover bonuses.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: Enemy units hit by this weapon must re-roll successful Save rolls of 1.

lance.name: Lance
lance.description: This weapon gets +1 AP when used during a Charge.

leader.name: Leader
leader.description: This unit may lead another unit with the same unit type keyword.

support.name: Support
support.description: When another friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" activates, this unit may perform a group activation with that unit. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly _Infantry_ unit.

support_x.name: Support
support_x.description: When another friendly unit of _X_ type within 6" activates, this unit may perform a group activation with that unit. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of _X_ type.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: When this model is activated, friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" may choose to activate and perform the same actions as this unit.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Strength.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at -1 Strength.

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: This weapon shoots at -1 Accuracy if its firer moved this activation.

accurate.name: Accurate
accurate.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Accuracy.

unreliable.name: Unreliable
unreliable.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at -1 Accuracy.

terrain.name: Terrain
terrain.description: This model may be placed anywhere on the field during deployment, more than 12" from any enemy units or deployment zones. Once placed, this unit is treated as terrain and may not be controlled or activated by the owning player.

impassable.name: Impassable
impassable.description: This model may not be crossed by X unit types.

clearable.name: Clearable(5)
clearable.description: _Infantry_ units within 3" of this model may take a Clear action to attempt to clear this obstacle. Roll a D10 and on a roll of 5 or less this obstacle is cleared.

garrison.name: Garrison
garrison.description: Up to X models or a gun with X or less Crew may occupy this model in the same way models occupy a building. If this model is destroyed while units are embarked, each model inside must take a single Save with no AP and then the unit takes 3 Shock.

soft_cover_x.name: Normal Cover
soft_cover_x.description: This model provides Normal Cover to X models in it.

soft_cover.name: Normal Cover
soft_cover.description: This model provides Normal Cover to models behind it.

hard_cover_x.name: Normal Cover
hard_cover_x.description: This model provides Normal Cover to X models in it.

hard_cover.name: Normal Cover
hard_cover.description: This model provides Normal Cover to models behind it.

skirmishers.name: Skirmishers
skirmishers.description: This unit has +1 Save when hit by a shooting attack, +1 to initiative tests when rushing and has a 3â€œ coherency instead of a 2â€œ coherency if all models in it have this rule.

musician.name: Musician
musician.description: Once per round, this model's unit may re-roll a single failed Initiative test when rushing.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: Once per round, this model's unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

champion.name: Champion
champion.description: Once per round, this model's unit may re-roll a single failed Accuracy or Strength test when attacking.

lethal.name: Lethal
lethal.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 from this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1. Additional hits must be assigned to the same model.

brutal.name: Brutal
brutal.description: This weapon gains +1 AP at Short range.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: This model's unit may re-roll failed Power tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: At the end of it's activation you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to this model.

crazed.name: Crazed
crazed.description: When you activate this unit make an initiative test. If successful, until the end of the turn whenever you make a move action with this unit you may rush without needing to make an initiative test.

battle_prayer.name: Battle Prayer
battle_prayer.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Blessing for this unit or a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Divine Shield: Roll a die when a model in this unit loses a wound. On a value of 1 or 2 that wound is not lost.
* Righteous Fury: When this unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Healing Word: One model in the unit immediately heals D3 wounds.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Curse for an enemy _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Weakness: This unit has -1 Strength and Accuracy when fighting or making a shooting attack.
* Brittle Bones: When this unit is targeted by an attack, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Soul Siphon: One model in the unit immediately takes 2 hits with AP2.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: This model may ignore other models and any terrain when moving.

knockback.name: Knockback
knockback.description: When an enemy model takes any unsaved hit by this weapon, you can push that model Xâ€œ directly away from this model.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

heavy_impact.name: Heavy Impact
heavy_impact.description: This model causes X Melee hits with AP(1) when it successfully charges an enemy unit.

disrupt.name: Disrupt
disrupt.description: This weapon has +X AP against units with _Damage Chart_.

inspiring.name: Inspiring
inspiring.description: This model's unit gains +1 Courage when taking Courage Tests.

tactician.name: Tactician
tactician.description: This model's unit may re-roll failed Accuracy and Strength tests of 9+.

charger.name: Charger
charger.description: This model's unit gains +3" of movement when _Charging_.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: This model's unit may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description: This model's unit may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+.

striker.name: Striker
striker.description: This model's unit gains +1 AP on all weapons.

legend_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
legend_strategist.description: While this model is alive and not broken you gain 1 additional Strategy Point at the start of the round.

legend_expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
legend_expert_fighter.description: This model may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon.

wings.name: Wings
wings.description: This model may ignore models and terrain when moving.

scrambler.name: Scrambler
scrambler.description: Enemy units arriving from reserves within 18" of this model suffer -2 Initiative on reserve tests.

assault_ramp.name: Assault Ramp
assault_ramp.description: Units may disembark from this model even after it has taken two _Move_ actions.

banner_of_wrath.name: Banner of Wrath
banner_of_wrath.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

banner_of_focus.name: Banner of Focus
banner_of_focus.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Shooting weapons.

dozer.name: Dozer
dozer.description: This model may cross low obstacles without penalty.

psych_out.name: Dangerous(Psychic)
psych_out.description: This weapon has +1 AP against units with the Psychic special rule.

dark_prism.name: Dark Prism
dark_prism.description: Once per round, when a model with Power(x) casts a power within 24", roll a D10. If the die roll is lower than or equal to the casting roll, the power is prevented.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description:
At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit: 
 * Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP 
 * Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1. 
 * +1 Save

disk_of_change.name: Disk of Change
disk_of_change.description: This model increases its Movement by 2". This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

psychic_prowess.name: Prowess
psychic_prowess.description: All Power charge values are increased by X for this model. For example a power requiring a 6 or less now requires 6+X or less.

hover_mode.name: Hover Mode
hover_mode.description: When this Aircraft is activated, it may choose to fly in Hover mode. If it does, units do not suffer -1 Accuracy when targeting this unit, but it is not required to make a _Move_ action when activated.

marking_flares.name: Marking Flares
marking_flares.description: Once per round, a friendly _Biker_ unit may gain +4" of Movement.

surveying_device.name: Surveying Device
surveying_device.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 12" may ignore the benefit of cover while shooting.

spotting_device.name: Spotting Device
spotting_device.description: Increase the short and long range of all ranged weapons equipped by this unit by 6".

titan_shield.name: Titan Shield
titan_shield.description: This unit subtracts 1 from all Damage Chart rolls.

no_retreat.name: No Retreat
no_retreat.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 3" may automatically pass a Break test.

amplification.name: Psionic Amplification
amplification.description: When making power tests within 6" of this model, you may roll two dice and discard one.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Models gain +1 Courage when taking Courage Tests within 6" of this model.

intensity.name: Intensity
intensity.description: This weapon has +X AP at long range.

medic_biker.name: Medic
medic_biker.description: Whenever a friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit within 6" loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

legend_battle_frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
legend_battle_frenzy.description: Once per turn a friendly unit within 6" of this model may re-roll all failed Strength tests of 9+ when attacking.

legend_power_surge.name: Power Surge
legend_power_surge.description: All Power charge values are increased by 1 for this model.

legend_disruptive_aura.name: Disruptive Aura
legend_disruptive_aura.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

legend_onslaught.name: Onslaught
legend_onslaught.description: Enemy units within 6" of this model suffer -1 Save until the end of the turn after being hit by an _Assault_ weapon.

legend_swiftness.name: Swiftness
legend_swiftness.description: This unit increases its Movement characteristic by 2".

legend_pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
legend_pathfinder.description: When this unit and up to two other units within 6â€œ are deployed or arrive from Reserves, they may make a free Move action. This action may not move within 12" of any enemy units.

legend_surprise_attack.name: Surprise Attack
legend_surprise_attack.description: When this unit is deployed or arrives from Reserves, it may make a free Shoot action.

legend_poison_mastery.name: Lethal Poison
legend_poison_mastery.description: Enemies hit by this weapon reduce their Save value by 2 (after AP) to a minimum of 5.

legend_heroism.name: Heroism
legend_heroism.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

legend_bulwark.name: Bulwark
legend_bulwark.description: Friendly units within 6" may re-roll a single failed Save test once per turn.

legend_defensive_mastery.name: Defensive Mastery
legend_defensive_mastery.description: This model may re-roll Save tests of 9+.

legend_stabilizer.name: Stabilizer
legend_stabilizer.description: This model ignores the Heavy special rule.

spotting_laser.name: Spotting Laser
spotting_laser.description:
Any time during this model's activation, pick an enemy unit within 36" to gain 1 spotting marker. When a friendly unit shoots at that target they may spend spotting markers to gain the following for that attack: 
 * One Marker: Re-roll Accuracy rolls of 9+ 
 * Two Markers: +1 Accuracy 


 These effects are cumulative and may be activated multiple times. At the end of the round, remove all spotting markers.

courageous.name: Courageous
courageous.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Courage test per round.

marksmen.name: Marksman
marksmen.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Accuracy test per round.

fighters.name: Fighter
fighters.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Strength test per round.

vigilant.name: Vigilant
vigilant.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Initiative test per round.

motivated.name: Motivated
motivated.description: When this unit activates, it may automatically remove one Shock point.

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: This unit increases its Movement characteristic by 1".

trained.name: Trained
trained.description: This unit increases its Initiative characteristic by 1.

infiltrators.name: Infiltrator
infiltrators.description: This unit may be set aside in reserves before the match begins if all models have outflank. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated you may place the unit within 6" of a table edge over 12" away from enemy units.

breachers.name: Breacher
breachers.description: Enemy units do not benefit from cover when hit by an attack made by this unit at short range.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: This unit increases its Courage characteristic by 1".

survivors.name: Survivor
survivors.description: Once per round a model in this unit may re-roll a Save roll".

unwavering.name: Unwavering
unwavering.description: Once per round this unit may automatically pass a Break test.

aggressive.name: Aggressive
aggressive.description: This unit may perform a free Aim action before Charging.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: This unit gains +1 Save when Charged.

tenacious.name: Tenacious
tenacious.description: Models in this unit count as one additional model for the purposes of controlling objectives.

careful.name: Careful
careful.description: This unit may perform a free Standby action after performing a Move action.

fearful.name: Fearful
fearful.description: This unit suffers -1 to Courage tests when removing Shock.

slowed.name: Slowed
slowed.description: This unit subtracts 1" from its Movement characteristic.

wounded.name: Wounded
wounded.description: This unit suffers -1 to Save rolls.

blinded.name: Blinded
blinded.description: This unit suffers -1 Accuracy for all tests.

weakened.name: Weakened
weakened.description: This unit suffers -1 Strength for all tests.

exhausted.name: Exhausted
exhausted.description: This unit suffers -1 Initiative for all tests.

stone_house.name: Stone/Brick House
stone_house.description: A stone or brick constructed house.

crater.name: Crater
crater.description: A blast crater created by artillery or another large object.

improvised_wall.name: Improvised Wall/Barricade
improvised_wall.description: An improvised barricade or hastily constructed wall.

wood_fence.name: Wooden Fence
wood_fence.description: A low fence, either wood stone or less durable material.

stone_wall.name: Stone Wall
stone_wall.description: A low wall, either concrete stone or other durable material.

woods.name: Woods
woods.description: A dense forest or wooded area.

ruined_building.name: Ruined Building
ruined_building.description: A ruined building. Can be multiple floors.

hedgerow.name: Hedgerow
hedgerow.description: A low hedgerow wild or trimmed.

bocage.name: Bocage
bocage.description: A thick section of bocage typically 6 feet or more in height.

spearhead_defense.name: Spearhead Defense
spearhead_defense.setup: You and your opponent must set up objective markers as shown in the mission map.
spearhead_defense.deployment: Roll off and the winner chooses a table edge to defend. Their opponent will get the opposite table edges to attack. The defender may additionally deploy any units inside the red marked area during deployment.
spearhead_defense.victory_conditions:
Players score 5 VP at the end of the round for each of the following: 
 * Controlling one objective 
 * Controlling two or more objectives 
 * Controlling three or more objectives

frontline.deployment: Roll off and the winner chooses a table edge for their reinforcements. Their opponent will get the opposite table edge.
frontline.victory_conditions:

 * Controlling one objective 
 * Controlling two or more objectives 
 * Controlling three or more objectives

night_fighting.name: Night Fighting
night_fighting.description: The perfect time for a raid is in the dead of night.
night_fighting.rules:
* Units may not target units at a range of more than 24â€œ.
* Mark any units that have made a Shoot action this round. That unit and friendly units within 3â€ are visible and may be targeted regardless of range restrictions.
* Light-emitting terrain or obstacles (campfires, lampposts etc.) light up units within 3â€ and they may be targeted regardless of range restrictions.

severe_storm.name: Severe Storm
severe_storm.description: While storms are certainly not ideal fighting conditions, some operations may be pushed forward regardless.
severe_storm.rules:
* Units performing a Move action that crosses terrain that isnâ€™t Road terrain or terrain designated as â€œStorm proofâ€œ must take an Initative test. If failed, that unit lose 2" of movement for that action.
* Units do not receive the +2â€œ Movement from Road terrain.

dense_fog.name: Dense Fog
dense_fog.description: While less imapactful than a fully night time attack, dense fog provides a challenge for those attempting to spot enemy units in it.
dense_fog.rules: * Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at units at a range of more than 12".

extreme_temperatures.name: Extreme Temperatures
extreme_temperatures.description: Some battles while not affected by poor visibility or storming conditions, may simply be too hot or cold to fight effectively.
extreme_temperatures.rules:
* At the start of the round, each unit not inside a Building or terrain designated as â€œSafe from the Elementsâ€œ receives 1 shock.
 * Units that have been been hit by a melee attack suffer -1 to Courage tests until the end of the round.

normal.name: Normal Conditions
normal.description: Both sides are prepared to fight normally.

preparatory_bombardment.name: Preparatory Bombardment
preparatory_bombardment.description: Both sides have opened with a large shelling of artillery to attempt to pin down the enemy before the attack commences.
preparatory_bombardment.rules: * At the start of the first round, all units on the board receive 2 Shock.

exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
exhaustion.description: The fighting has lasted days or weeks without end and both forces are beginning to break.
exhaustion.rules: * All units suffer -1 to Courage tests and receive 1 additional Shock when hit by a melee attack.

sworn_enemies.name: Sworn Enemies
sworn_enemies.description: Both sides have fought previously and are now bitter rivals. Today they are here to fight.
sworn_enemies.rules: * When making a Charge action, units may move an additional 2" and gain +1 Strength for that action.

organizational_chaos.name: Organizational Chaos
organizational_chaos.description: The chain of command has fallen short and the soldiers are now fighting with or without orders.
organizational_chaos.rules: * All units suffer -1 to Courage tests.

infiltrate.name: Infiltrate
infiltrate.description: Infiltrating the enemy zone and gathering intel can be critical to success.
infiltrate.rules: * Once per round, a unit may perform the Gather Intel action inside the enemy deployment area. Perform an Initiative test with that unit. If successful, gain 5 VP.

secure.name: Secure
secure.description: Securing an objective for further control can be essential.
secure.rules: * Once per round, a unit in range of an objective may perform the Secure action. Perform an Initiative test with that unit. If successful, gain 3 VP.

new_orders.name: New Orders
new_orders.description: New orders have been received and additional objectives are available.
new_orders.rules: * Each player places one additional objective 12" away from any existing objectives and more than 12" away from their deployment area.

breakthrough.name: Breakthrough
breakthrough.description: Breaking through enemy lines can cause havoc for troop organization.
breakthrough.rules: * Once per round, players may move a unit off their opponents table edge. After doing so, remove the unit from the board and gain 5 VP.

take_and_hold.name: Take and Hold
take_and_hold.description: Taking key ground can be critical to moving the frontline forward.
take_and_hold.rules: * Each player places one additional objective inside the enemy deployment area and 12" away from all existing objectives.

priority_orders.name: Priority Orders
priority_orders.description: A message has come from high command to take this important objective.
priority_orders.rules: * Players designate one objective to be their priority objective. If held, you gain 3 VP. This cannot be the objective closest to your deployment zone.

critical_asset.name: Critical Asset
critical_asset.description: You must take a secure an important item for further investigation.
critical_asset.rules:
* Place one critical item objective marker at the center of the table. At the end of the round, if a player controls that objective, that unit picks up the objective marker and it travels with the unit. If the unit is killed, place the objective marker where the unit was destroyed. 
* At the end of the round, the player controlling the objective marker gains 2 VP and at the end of the game the player that controls the objective marker gains an additional 5 VP.

caches.name: Caches
caches.description: Important caches are scattered throughout the battlefield which can be secured.
caches.rules:
* Players roll off and alternate placing 6 cache markers on the field within 3" of any objective marker and more than 3" away from other cache markers.
* No objective may have more than 2 cache markers placed within 3â€œ of it.
* Units may perform the Recover action when in base contact with a cache marker. Perform an Initiative test with that unit. If successful, gain 3 VP and remove the cache marker from the board.

attrition.name: Attrition
attrition.description: As the losses add up, both sides must consider what they are willing to do to win.
attrition.rules:
* Players score 2 additional VP for each enemy unit that is full destroyed.
* Any unit may perform the Withdraw action if it is not engaged in melee. When performed, the unit is removed from the table, but does not count as being destroyed.

raze.name: Raze
raze.description: Destroying an objective can ensure your opponent cannot use it against you.
raze.rules: * At the end of the round after objectives are scored, if you control more than one objective, you may choose to destroy an objective you control for 5 VP. After you do this, remove the objective from the board.

lockdown.name: Lockdown
lockdown.description: It is not enough to simply control important ground. It must be fully locked down.
lockdown.rules: * Each objective with no enemy units within 12" grants an additional 3 VP.

domination.name: Domination
domination.description: Securing the most ground can give you a positional advantage in the fight.
domination.rules: * At the end of the round after objectives are scored, if you have a non-engaged unit in at least 3 table quarters, gain 3 VP. If you have an non-engaged unit in all table quarters gain 5 VP instead.

bounty.name: Bounty
bounty.description: It is sometimes necessary to eliminate a key target during the battle for operational purposes.
bounty.rules: * Choose one enemy unit at the start of the game. If that unit is fully destroyed, gain 5 VP.

conquest.name: Conquest
conquest.description: Taking ground from the enemy can be even more satisfying than holding your own.
conquest.rules: * At the end of the round, each objective captured which was previously controlled by an enemy grants an additional 3 VP.

deploy.name: Deploy
deploy.description: Setting up critical battlefield objectives can prove valuable in the coming battles.
deploy.rules:
* Choose up to 3 units at the start of the game to carry a deploy objective marker. 
* During a unit's activation, they may perform an initiative test to setup a deploy objective marker outside their deployment area and in base contact with a model from the unit. 
* A player with more models within 3" of that objective marker may perform an Initiative test to destroy a deploy objective marker. 
* At the end of the game, players earn 3 VP for each deploy objective marker still active on the table.
